name: Doctor in Patient
description:
This game is made in Unity 2020.1.0f1. I made this game using Unity's FPS Creator Kit because I am a complete beginner in Game Development. Hope you enjoy it. 

Story:

During a checkup, the doctor gets sucked into the patient's body and has to fight all the germs inside of the patient's body to escape the body. For escaping, he needs to first find the key for the first door and then the last door. Will he escape the patient's body. Play the game to find out. It depends upon your detective skills. Find the key inside of the patient's body. It looks like a small jelly. But, when you look into it clearly, you will be able to see the key in it. Good Luck finding the key.The key in the first room is not real. Go find the real key.

Controls:

W,A,S,D=Move

1 - HealMatic Gun

2 - Machine Gun

3 - Pills

Shift - Run

The key in the first room is not real. Go find the real key.
